Majority	Miscellaneous-algorithm/tool

.	O

of	O
multi	NLP-algorithm/tool
-	NLP-algorithm/tool
annotator	NLP-algorithm/tool
models	NLP-algorithm/tool
.	O

In	O
particular	O
,	O
our	O
multi	Miscellaneous-term
-	Miscellaneous-term
task	Miscellaneous-term
based	Miscellaneous-term
approach	Miscellaneous-term
treats	O
predicting	O
each	O
annotators	O

judgements	O
as	O
separate	AI/ML/DL-term
subtasks	AI/ML/DL-term
while	O

a	O
common	AI/ML/DL-term
learned	AI/ML/DL-term
representation	AI/ML/DL-term
of	O
the	O
task	O
.	O

We	O
show	O
that	O
this	O
approach	O
yields	O

or	O

than	O

labels	O
in	O
the	O
data	AI/ML/DL-term

.	O

human	Miscellaneous-term

.	O

Recent	O
efforts	O
to	O
create	O
challenge	O
benchmarks	O
that	O
test	O
the	O
abilities	O
of	O
natural	NLP-algorithm/tool
language	NLP-algorithm/tool

models	NLP-algorithm/tool

on	O
human	Miscellaneous-term

.	O

In	O
this	O
work	O
,	O
we	O
introduce	O
the	O
“	O
Break	O
,	O
Perturb	O
,	O
Build	O
”	O
(	O
BPB	O
)	O
framework	O
for	O
automatic	O
reasoning	O
-	O
oriented	O
perturbation	O
of	O
question	NLP-term
-	NLP-term
answer	NLP-term
pairs	NLP-term
.	O

BPB	O
represents	O
a	O
question	O
by	O
decomposing	O
it	O
into	O
the	O
reasoning	O
steps	O
that	O
are	O
required	O
to	O
answer	O
it	O
,	O
symbolically	O
perturbs	O
the	O
decomposition	NLP-algorithm/tool
and	O
then	O
generates	O
new	O
question	NLP-term
-	NLP-term
answer	NLP-term
pairs	NLP-term
.	O

BPB	O
represents	O
a	O
question	O
by	O
decomposing	O
it	O
into	O
the	O
reasoning	O
steps	O
that	O
are	O
required	O
to	O
answer	O
it	O
,	O
symbolically	O
perturbs	O
the	O
decomposition	NLP-algorithm/tool
and	O
then	O
generates	O
new	O
question	NLP-term
-	NLP-term
answer	NLP-term
pairs	NLP-term

.	O

can	O

to	O

.	O

.	O

order	O
.	O

(	O

.	O

Our	O

model	O
uses	O

.	O

.	O

representation	Statistical/Mathematical-term
.	O

It	O
employs	O
a	O
novel	O

is	O
composed	O
of	O
a	O

.	O

Federated	AI/ML/DL-algorithm/tool
averaging	AI/ML/DL-algorithm/tool
(	AI/ML/DL-algorithm/tool
FedAvg	AI/ML/DL-algorithm/tool
)	AI/ML/DL-algorithm/tool
is	O
a	O
communication	O
-	O
efficient	O
algorithm	Miscellaneous-term
for	O
distributed	O
training	O
with	O
an	O
enormous	O
number	O
of	O
clients	O
.	O

In	O
FedAvg	AI/ML/DL-algorithm/tool
clients	O
keep	O
their	O
data	O
locally	O
for	O
privacy	O
protection	O
;	O
a	O
central	O
parameter	O

is	O

to	O
communicate	O
between	O
clients	O
.	O

This	O
central	O
server	O
distributes	O
the	O
parameters	AI/ML/DL-term
parameters	AI/ML/DL-term
ent	O
and	O
collects	O
the	O
updated	O
parameters	O
from	O
clients	O
.	O

FedAvg	AI/ML/DL-algorithm/tool
is	O
mostly	O
studied	O
in	O

fashions	O

.	O

study	O
the	O
decentralized	O

momentum	O
(	O

on	O

graph	Miscellaneous-term
.	O

all	O
clients	O
perform	O
stochastic	AI/ML/DL-algorithm/tool
gradient	AI/ML/DL-algorithm/tool
descent	AI/ML/DL-algorithm/tool
with	O

and	O

with	O
their	O

only	O
.	O

proposed	O

matrix	O
